name: The Sacrificial Adventurer
description:
Here it is! This game was made for Ludum Dare 43 in under a weekend. The theme was "Sacrifices Must Be Made".

In this platformer, you are an adventurer who is seemingly cursed, and who must reach the end goal of each stage. However, there is a catch...

Note: I had no time to make audio for it sadly, and just thought I'd mention that the game may involve trial and error. Hopefully it's at least a little bit of fun.

--Controls--

Move: A & D
Shield: W
Jump: Space

Reset Game: R
Exit Game: Esc

Personal Note: 
The game is lacking audio for now due to my lack of time for the Jam, no thanks to debugging. Thankfully I can start working on it now!

Made by Alexandre Laframboise (Lexyvil) in MonoGame/XNA in C#.
